manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stretch Ear Loops, Snug Fit Stretch ear loops allow for the perfect fit. EnerPlex recommends using the accompanying size chart in order to find the best size mask for your particular face shape and size. Simple design paired with easy on loops allow for easy on and off with the EnerPlex washable face mask. Three Layers of Fabric - Water Resistant Constructed from three layers of high quality fabric, the EnerPlex reusable face mask is water resistant and breathable. The tightly woven middle layer serves to keep out anything floating in the wearer's surroundings, while still allowing for unrestricted breathing. Lay Flat Seams Durable and strong, the mask's lay flat seams, create a snug fit across the bridge of the nose and cheeks, and secure the mask below the chin. The soft materials allow for breathing and talking comfortably while wearing the face mask.

EnerPlex is the producer of high-end home products featuring quality fabrics. In recent months EnerPlex’s manufacturing has pivoted to include production of face masks to help meet the demand for customer needs. Care and Cleaning Made with machine washable materials, the protective mask can be washed after use. No more wasteful throw away masks! Wash before first use Machine wash cold Do not bleach Do not dry clean No fabric softener Tumble dry low or lay flat dry to avoid shrinkage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Reliable
reviews.reviewText: Having worn so many masks for so long over the past few years, I have found a keeper! This mask is cut perfectly so it doesn't stifle my nose or mouth. It sits comfortably and not too tightly off my face, and it's cut perfectly. If I put it on just right, my glasses do not fog and I can breathe. I have worn it on long flights and have felt secure from the coughing and sneezing all around me. I will gladly wear it while teaching because the kids have already forgotten how to sneeze and cough safely! It says that it's washable, and I'll be testing that next. It's sturdy fabric that does not make my nose itch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Are you still looking for the right mask look no further
reviews.reviewText: The EnerPlex Reusable Face Cloth Mask is an excellent choice for anyone who wants a comfortable and effective mask for daily use. This mask is made from high-quality materials that are designed to provide maximum comfort and protection.One of the best things about this mask is its extreme comfort. It features a soft, breathable fabric that feels great against the skin and is gentle enough for all-day wear. The mask is also adjustable, which means you can get a secure and comfortable fit every time.But the EnerPlex Reusable Face Cloth Mask is not just comfortable – it's also highly effective. The mask is designed to filter out a wide range of airborne particles, including dust, pollen, and other allergens. It's also effective at filtering out larger particles like bacteria and viruses, which makes it an excellent choice for use in public places.Another great thing about this mask is that it's reusable. You can wash and dry it after each use, which makes it an environmentally friendly and cost-effective alternative to disposable masks.Overall, I highly recommend the EnerPlex Reusable Face Cloth Mask to anyone who wants a comfortable and effective mask for daily use. It's made from high-quality materials, it's adjustable for a comfortable fit, and it's reusable for added convenience and environmental friendliness. Whether you're running errands or commuting to work, this mask is sure to provide the protection and comfort you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable, Soft and Breathable!
reviews.reviewText: The mask are very nice, they fit our faces well from the bridge of our noses all the way to under our chins. And we got some big skulls lolFogging of glasses is minimal & even with my thick beard it’s snug enough to give full coverage. For close to 100% protection, doctors recommend wearing a surgical mask under a cloth one & these are very comfortable with a surgical mask underneath it, even after hours of wear.THEY DO PASS THE FLASHLIGHT TEST WITH ANOTHER SURGICAL MASK! That test is to shine a flashlight through the mask and if you can’t see the light, you have the best protection. If you can see a small bit of light, that’s okay too but if you’re able to add another layer without compromising your breathing, doctors suggest you do so.The only reason I’m giving this 4 stars instead of 5 is that I ordered the 3 pack large mask, but only 2 were consistent in size. The 3rd mask was a tiny bit smaller, kinda like a medium large, not a large large. With some adjusting on the face, it fits just fine but it’s not exact like the other 2 large mask I got.I wish I could give 4.5 stars instead of 4 because this is something minor & probably only occurs 1 out of 100,000 orders. I will still buy again though.Stay safe, y’all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Functional, Compatible With Glasses
reviews.reviewText: These masks are very well made and durable, the price is worth it for the quality if that’s making you think twice. The designer of this mask should get an award. I can’t get over how perfectly this conforms to my face (5’2 adult woman, wearing the Medium size) yet doesn’t feel stifling or sweltering. Breathing is totally natural. It doesn’t shift or get annoying and hasn’t aggravated my skin or left indents on my face. Other masks have left me sweaty and gross and caused horrible breakouts for me but not this one. I like the fabric that is on the outer facing side as well because lint and debris doesn’t stick to it and stray hairs are easily brushed off.I wear a mask 8+ hours a day due to my job, which is also a very active job (on my feet all day, rushing to and fro, constantly moving my arms, bending down, kneeling, reaching, working in both hot and freezing environments with heavy lifting for part of it) so it’s important that a mask is breathable and comfortable. It doesn’t fog up my glasses or ride up my nose and interfere with the bridge of the glasses like some other masks do. It’s pretty comfortable on my ears as well (and fits comfortably even with the glasses arms perched on my ears, some other mask ear loops get in the way) and I have yet to have the elastic snap/break.I handwash these masks and they air dry very quickly. I put one in the washing machine and dryer by accident and it DID shrink - the manufacturer recommends against the washing machine and dryer for a reason!I ended up buying a bunch of these masks because they are so far the most perfect for me that I have found. I would recommend them to anyone but ESPECIALLY if: 1) you need to wear one while being fairly active for extended periods and 2) you wear glasses because it can be hard to find a comfortable mask that is compatible with glasses.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super comfortable, soft and good coverage
reviews.reviewText: I discovered these masks while searching for youth masks for my youngest. On the images provided it shows the purchaser how to select the most accurate size for your needs. What I found unclear was aligning the children’s sizes with the adult sizes. The children’s mask image gave a description based on size and measurement and word labelling that didn’t match the options available when clicking on purchase so I selected the medium (which was the second size from the smallest). I assumed that the medium matched the second size up in the children’s masks. The mediums came in and fit quite well for the adults in the home (a tad big for doable) but were too big for my child. I then ordered the small size. The size of the masks were a bit smaller and work with a bit of knotting in the ear loops. The loop elastic material is much thinner and more flimsy in the small masks than the medium masks. I must have ordered both sizes as adult masks. In terms of comfort the masks are amazing! They are soft and conform very nicely to the face. They are easy to wear for long periods of time. Great for those with sensitive skin! They wash well and maintain their shape. I purchased them because of the reviews. I would purchase them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: One of the most suitable face masks to use.
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't be more satisfied with this face masks.They are made from a perfect material, light, soft and supple and breathable.The design is such that takes the shape of the face in mind. It fits the face snug and comfortably with a good hold to where it should, without interfering with other parts of face.The sizing is spot on if you select the right size for you. It appears that size" Medium" would fit average adultswith an average size face, depending on the personal considerations of course.

My face measurement was 4.5" (female) and I opted for the youth/medium size. It easily fits slightly below my chin and covers my nose. I wear glasses, so I put a paper clip in the top of the lining and bent it around my nose and my glasses don't fog up. I find the masks look nice, are breathable, and comfy. I'm glad I went for the smaller size, as I think the larger size would have been too big for my face.My only con is, the mask kind of has too much space in the front and looks pointy like a beak. To be honest, these are my first re-usable masks so I'm not sure if that's normal or not. Personally, I don't really mind it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for Adults with a Small head!
reviews.reviewText: Had been looking for smaller masks as I have a small head and Children’s masks too small. These are perfect and very comfortable. Have a nice shape that fit over the nose and my glasses do not steam up as much as with other masks.

reviews.reviewTitle: Agréable et léger mais pas anticovid
reviews.reviewText: Je ne vais pas m'entendre sur la partie sanitaire, le masque n'est pas anticovid et ne prétend pas l'être. C'est d'ailleurs pour cela que j'ai retiré une étoile. Pour le reste, il est parfait. Agréable à porter, doux et doublé en coton à l'intérieur. J'ai pris le la taille intermédiaire qui est parfaite pour un visage adulte standard. Je l'utilise régulièrement depuis un mois, je le lave à la main et il ne bouge pas. L'élastique tient bon pour le moment. J'ai fait imprimer le nom de ma team par un professionnel et ça tient bien en le lavant à la main je le rappelle. Un très bon achat à ce niveau de prix. On peut facilement mettre un masque chirurgical dessous si on est dans la foule, il laisse passer l'air sans difficulté de respiration. Je recommande...
